author: Adam Bankhurst
title: The Marvels Wins the Box Office But Has the Worst MCU Opening Weekend of All Time
description: While The Marvels may have won the domestic weekend box office, it also had the worst MCU opening of all time with ticket sales of $47.0 million.
content:
While The Marvels may have won the domestic weekend box office, it also had the worst MCU opening of all time with ticket sales of $47.0 million.
